data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Rangpur.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rangpur, Rangpur, Bangladesh

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Rangpur, Rangpur, Bangladesh to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 3,609 believers in Rangpur against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Rangpur to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Aguri people.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 3,609 believers in Rangpur, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,609 believers in Rangpur to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,877,491 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the county of Rangpur, Rangpur, Bangladesh has a population of 2,881,100.

We estimate Rangpur has 3,609 people who might know Jesus, 8,643 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,868,848 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Rangpur, Rangpur, Bangladesh today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

location.name: Rangpur
